summary: Comprehensive testing of Camp Baraisa major updates - Settings page (5 tabs), Delete/Trash/Restore, Data Center saved lists, Kanban email templates, removed quick action buttons. All 24 backend tests passed. Frontend features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created test campers for delete/restore testing via backend tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working: Settings (Account, Admins, Templates, API Keys, Trash tabs), Camper delete moves to trash, Restore from trash works, Data Center saved lists with field selection, Kanban drag-drop with status change, No Call/SMS/Email buttons on Kanban cards or CamperDetail page.

settings_page.account_tab: PASS - Name, Email, Phone fields visible and editable
settings_page.admins_tab: PASS - Admin list shows, Add Admin button works, edit/delete actions available
settings_page.templates_tab: PASS - Template list with auto-triggers (âš¡ icons), New Template button works
settings_page.api_keys_tab: PASS - Twilio and Gmail API key configuration available
settings_page.trash_tab: PASS - Shows deleted campers with Restore and Permanent Delete buttons

camper_delete.delete_button: PASS - Trash icon visible on each camper row
camper_delete.delete_flow: PASS - Confirmation dialog, moves to trash, toast notification
camper_delete.restore_flow: PASS - Restore button in Settings > Trash works correctly

data_center.saved_lists: PASS - Shows existing lists with field tags
data_center.create_list: PASS - Editor with name, description, sort options, field checkboxes
data_center.field_selection: PASS - Organized by category (Camper Info, Parent Info, Yeshiva Info)

kanban.drag_drop: PASS - Cards can be dragged between columns
kanban.status_change: PASS - Toast notification on status change
kanban.no_quick_actions: PASS - No Call/SMS/Email buttons on cards

camper_detail.no_quick_actions: PASS - No Call/SMS/Email quick action buttons
camper_detail.parent_info: PASS - Simplified parent info card (display only)

fixes_applied.data_center_select_error: Fixed SelectItem with empty string value causing 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop' error. Changed to use 'none' value with conversion.
